"A.D.2028/4/17/12:30": "Where... am I?"
"Hitsugi would never say such a thing."
"That's right... I was cut down by Kohri."
"Did I die? But wait... then..."
"And this time, I will help my big sis! I'm not going to let you die!"
"I heard Aru's voice... and it was warm... What happened...?"
"I guess it doesn't matter... I don't matter... Why should I care?"
"Not knowing what I wanted to do... and what I needed to do... I was just there, following the flow."
"It's all my fault... I'm done now... I don't want to do anything anymore."
"Yes... I have no worth... My weapon was broken, and I lost to Kohri... I'm of no use to anyone, anymore..."
"I was never meant for this kind of thing... I never wanted to do any of it... I just did it because other people told me to..."
"Joining the student council... Helping Mother Cluster... Even saving Aru was just..."
"I was the one who wanted to be saved! Father and mother went away... and big bro would never look at me...!"
"Because everyone left me behind... I was scared, and even though I kept trying and trying... kept on trying my best..."
"No one ever protected me... No one was ever by my side!"
"I'm tired... no more... I'm sick of being a good girl..."
"I hate being scared, and I hate pain! The suffering and pain of being alone... I don't want to feel it anymore!"
"What do I wanted to accomplish? What are my intentions? I knew the real answer all along..."
"I wanted a place where I belong. I wanted to protect the things I loved. That's all I wanted, but..."
"...Why? What did I do wrong? Where did I go wrong?"
"Tell me... please, somebody tell me!"
"I'm sick of all this... I'm sick of it! Kohri... big bro... Aru... <%me>..."
